member.name: IAppxFactory.CreateBlockMapReader
member.summary: Creates a read-only block map object model from contents provided by an .
member.param: The stream that delivers the block map XML for reading. The stream must support , , and . If these methods fail, their error codes might be passed to and returned by this method.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The inputStream does not contain syntactically valid XML for the block map.

member.name: IAppxFactory.CreateManifestReader
member.summary: Creates a read-only manifest object model from contents provided by an .
member.param: The input stream that delivers the manifest XML for reading. The stream must support , , and . If these methods fail, their error codes might be passed to and returned by this method.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The inputStream does not contain syntactically valid XML for the manifest.

member.name: IAppxFactory.CreatePackageReader
member.summary: Creates a read-only package reader from the contents provided by an . This method does not validate the digital signature.
member.param: The input stream that delivers the content of the package for reading. The stream must support , , and . If these methods fail, their error codes might be passed to and returned by this method.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The ZIP file delivered by inputStream is an interleaved OPC package.
The OPC package delivered by inputStream contains OPC package/part relationships.
The OPC package delivered by inputStream does not have a manifest, or a block map, or a signature file when a CI catalog is present.
The package manifest is not valid.

The package block map is not valid, the list of files in the ZIP central directory does not match the list of files in the block map, or the size of files listed in the ZIP central directory does not match the file and block sizes listed in the block map.

member.name: IAppxFactory.CreatePackageWriter
member.summary: Creates a write-only package object to which files can be added.
member.param: The output stream that receives the serialized package data. The stream must support at least the method.
The settings for the production of this package.
The package writer created by this method.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified hashMethod member of the structure is not a valid hash algorithm URI.
The specified hashMethod member of the structure is not a valid hash algorithm URI.

member.name: IAppxFactory.CreateValidatedBlockMapReader
member.summary: Creates a read-only block map object model from contents provided by an and a digital signature.
member.param: The stream that delivers block map XML for reading. The stream must support , , and .
The file that contains a digital signature used to validate the contents of the input stream.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those below. This method might return errors that are passed from the underlying validation APIs that are used. For example, this method might return "Crypto and WinTrust error codes (0x8009xxxx, 0x800bxxxx) if the signature can't be read, is invalid, or doesn't match the content of blockMapStream.

listheader.description: The blockMapStream does not contain syntactically valid XML for the block map.

member.name: IAppxFactory
member.summary: Creates objects for reading and writing app packages.
